intro: Lepistemon binectarifer var. taynguyenensis, commonly known as the Tay Nguyen lepistemon, is a flowering plant native to Vietnam. It belongs to the family Loganiaceae and is characterized by its striking yellow and orange flowers. The plant typically grows in forested areas and is known for its medicinal properties. Its leaves and flowers are used in traditional medicine for their purported health benefits. The species is relatively rare and is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
